name: Galencia
overview: Galencia is a game developed in 2017 by Jason Aldred and published by Protovision. It is heavily inspired by the 80s arcade smash hit Galaga. The game has 50 waves (levels) for you to complete. It won the 2017 Game of the year from Reset64 Magazine. A modified version called Galancia Mini was released for free on the December 2018 firmware update for the C64 Mini. From Protovision's website: EARTH, 2017. We didn't listen to the warnings. We decided to ignore the decline of our bee population,and now their guardians have arrived. You must pilot the 1981 Galencia Fighter and restore order. Before its too late!
